title: Deep elf summoner
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

*For a list of all deep elves, see [list of deep elves](/List_of_deep_elves "List of deep elves").*

| deep elf summoner e [![Deep elf summoner.png](/images/e/e1/Deep_elf_summoner.png)](/File:Deep_elf_summoner.png) |                                                                        |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                                                  | 36-63                                                                  |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                                                                      | 9                                                                      |
| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                                                                  | 698                                                                    |
| [Speed](/Movement "Movement")                                                                                   | 10                                                                     |
| [AC](/Armour_class "Armour class")                                                                              | 1                                                                      |
| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                                                        | 12                                                                     |
| [MR](/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance")                                                                      | 80                                                                     |
| Attack1                                                                                                         | 5 ([hit](/Attack_type "Attack type"))                                  |
| [Max Chunks](/Corpse "Corpse")                                                                                  | 4                                                                      |
| [Type of Meat](/Corpse "Corpse")                                                                                | [Clean](/Category:Clean_corpse "Category:Clean corpse")                |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                                         | None                                                                   |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                                               | None                                                                   |
| [Habitat](/Habitat "Habitat")                                                                                   | Land                                                                   |
| [Intelligence](/Monster_intelligence "Monster intelligence")                                                    | [Human](/Category:Human_intelligence "Category:Human intelligence")    |
| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                                                                | [Weapons & armour](/Category:Weapons_armour "Category:Weapons armour") |
| [Holiness](/Holiness "Holiness")                                                                                | [Natural](/Category:Natural_holiness "Category:Natural holiness")      |
| [Size](/Size "Size")                                                                                            | [Medium](/Category:Medium_monsters "Category:Medium monsters")         |
| [Type](/Type "Type")                                                                                            | elf, elf                                                               |
| Flags                                                                                                           | [Speaks](/Speaks "Speaks")                                             |

|   |                                                              |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | A deep elf skilled at summoning plagues of insidious vermin. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Deep elf summoners** are fragile [deep elf](/List_of_deep_elves "List of deep elves") [Summonings](/Summonings "Summonings") specialists that tend to flood the screen with all manner of [vermin](/Summon_Vermin "Summon Vermin"). They appear in packs with other deep elves in the [Elven Halls](/Elven_Halls "Elven Halls") and some [baileys](/Bailey "Bailey").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                 |                                                     |
| :---------- | ----------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Blink](/Blink "Blink")                         | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Summon Vermin](/Summon_Vermin "Summon Vermin") | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

When a pack of deep elves shows up, try not to ignore any deep elf summoners that may be present. Although their summons are mostly harmless, they can get in the way of actual threats, and enough of them can leave you dangerously [poisoned](/Poison "Poison").

## History

In [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), deep elf summoners were removed and [deep elf mages](/Deep_elf_mage "Deep elf mage") will be able to summon vermin.

Prior to [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), they knew [Summon Demon](/Summon_Demon "Summon Demon") and [Summon Small Mammals](/Summon_Small_Mammals "Summon Small Mammals") in place of [Summon Vermin](/Summon_Vermin "Summon Vermin").
html:
Deep elf summoner

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.

For a list of all deep elves, see list of deep elves.

deep elf summoner e

 

HP 36-63
HD 9
XP 698
Speed 10
AC 1
EV 12
MR 80
Attack1 5 (hit)


Max Chunks 4
Type of Meat Clean
Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type elf, elf
Flags Speaks
A deep elf skilled at summoning plagues of insidious vermin.


Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Deep elf summoners are fragile deep elf Summonings specialists that tend to flood the screen with all manner of vermin. They appear in packs with other deep elves in the Elven Halls and some baileys.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Blink Wizard flag
Slot2 Summon Vermin Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

When a pack of deep elves shows up, try not to ignore any deep elf summoners that may be present. Although their summons are mostly harmless, they can get in the way of actual threats, and enough of them can leave you dangerously poisoned.

History

In 0.18, deep elf summoners were removed and deep elf mages will be able to summon vermin.

Prior to 0.13, they knew Summon Demon and Summon Small Mammals in place of Summon Vermin.

Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Deep_elf_summoner&oldid=43769"
